author: bridge-bot
content:
<pgebheim> I expect the way this will work is that this is an addition to a client that parties who are running provers will run.

The goal here is that we dont have 15 slightly different but nearly the same APIs, and instead at least come up with a spec for a superset of what's needed and combined what we can. (re @drinkcoffee2022: >Is it something 
>you expect Ethereum 
>clients to implement?
They could choose to. It would allow them to be used as part of a decentralized sequencer. Initially, we (Immutable) would plan to put it into our fork of Geth.)
